mapper.insert: INSERT INTO team_diary (id, diary_id, team_id) VALUES (#{id}, #{diary_id}, #{team_id});
mapper.select: SELECT d.id, u.first_name, u.last_name, u.initial, u.color, d.written_date, d.diary_title FROM team_diary td JOIN diaries d ON td.diary_id = d.id JOIN users u ON d.writer_id = u.id WHERE td.team_id = #{teamId};
SELECT td.team_id, t.team_name FROM team_diary td JOIN teams t ON td.team_id = t.id WHERE td.diary_id = #{diaryId};
